title: Write STICS met files — met2model.STICS
text: Converts met CF file model specific met file. input files calld <.path>/<.prefix>.YYYY.cf

title: Write STICS met files — met2model.STICS
code: met2model.STICS(   in.path,   in.prefix,   outfolder,   start_date,   end_date,   overwrite = FALSE,   ... )

title: Write STICS met files — met2model.STICS
text: .path path disk CF file lives .prefix prefix file outfolder location model specific output written. start_date start date simulation end_date end date simulation overwrite logical: replace output files already exist? ... arguments passed function

what: Code to convert STICS' output into netCDF format — model2netcdf.STICS
title: Code to convert STICS' output into netCDF format — model2netcdf.STICS
text: Convert STICS output NACP Intercomparison format (ALMA using netCDF)

title: Code to convert STICS' output into netCDF format — model2netcdf.STICS

title: Code to convert STICS' output into netCDF format — model2netcdf.STICS

title: PEcAn.STICS 1.8.2
text: model2netcdf.STICS longer writes separate <year>.nc.var files every year output. Use PEcAn.utils::nc_write_varfiles() create needed.

title: PEcAn.STICS 1.8.1
text: PEcAn.STICS now distributed BSD three-clause license instead NCSA Open Source license.

title: PEcAn.STICS 1.7.1
text: First public release, numbered match current PEcAn version.
